{{sources}}
'''''-ssë''''' is a [[Quenya]] suffix that has two meanings.
==-ssë<sup>1</sup>==
Meaning (singular) ''in,'' ''on'' or ''at'' and can also be written as '''''-essë'''''<ref>{{PE|17}}, p. 62</ref> 

:'''Plural''': ''-ssen'' or ''-issen'' for consonant endings.<ref>{{PE|17}}, p. 135</ref>
:'''Partitive Plural''': ''-lissen'' or ''-ilissen'' for consonant endings.
:'''Dual''': ''-tsë''
==-ssë<sup>2</sup>==
To denote abstract or locality
===Examples===
*'''[[Vala]]''' = "angelic power, god" ('''valassë''' = "divinity"|[[BAL]])<ref>{{LR|P3}}, p. 350</ref>
*'''laiqua''' = "green" ('''laiquassë''' = "greenness")<ref>{{LT1|Appendix}}, p. 267</ref>
*'''hande''' = "intelligent" ('''handessë''' = "intelligence"|[[KHAN]])<ref>{{LR|P3}}, p. 363</ref>
*'''hópa''' = "harbour" ('''hopassë''' = "harbourage"|[[KHOP]]) <ref>{{LR|P3}}, p. 364</ref>
*'''findë''' = "hair" ('''findessë''' = "head of hair")<ref>{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://eldamo.org/content/words/word-1969055347.html?neo|articlename=Q. findessë|website=Eldamo|accessed=17 May 2025}}</ref>

{{references}}
